definition: lit. find a stage, put on a comedy (idiom); to join in the fun/to play along according to local conditions
to be glib in one's speech and wear an ingratiating expression (idiom)
graceful words, flowery speech (idiom); elegant but insincere words/cheating wheedling/dishonest rhetoric
to be totally devoted (to a person)
to bow down to everything sb says or does/to act submissively in order to ingratiate oneself
to say sth without meaning it (idiom); to speak tongue in cheek/saying one thing but meaning sth different
